readable.title: 2720215226_5a98ff2bd3
readable.content: A black dog with a ribbon on is standing in front of some other award ribbons . A brown dog has a blue and white ribbon pinned to him , and teal and yellow ribbons behind him . A brown dog poses with ribbons . A dog wearing a blue ribbon sits in front of a fireplace that displays more ribbons . a small brown dog standing in front of a fireplace surrounded by awards .
